title: Job-Based Design Management Skill Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A reflective practice learning environment incorporating real workplace project cases

learning_goals: Learners can execute the design strategy development process in real work environments, divided into three or more stages.
Learners can improve design task efficiency by 20% or more using project budget, schedule, and quality management tools.
Learners can propose communication strategies to manage five or more types of conflicts that may arise in multidisciplinary team collaboration.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
